skills.name: Boiling Burst
skills.description: Upon skill activation, ATK and DEF gradually increase to +80%, and attacks slice enemies in front of this unit. When this skill ends, this unit loses 25% HP and deals 400% ATK as Physical damage to surrounding enemies

talents.name: Emergency Defibrillation
talents.description: When this unit's HP falls beneath 25%, restores 50% HP (one time only) and prevents HP from falling under 50% for 7<@ba.talpu>(+1)</> seconds

talents.name: Harsh Training
talents.description: Gains status resistance after being deployed for 12<@ba.talpu>(-3)</> seconds (reduces the duration of stun, cold, and freeze effects by 50%)
